title: quickshop怎么限制商店每日收购上限
author: White_Xu
txt_content: quickshop怎么限制商店每日收购上限

replies.author: KALDK
replies.txt_content:
QS插件没有这个配置

建议使用Bossshoppro插件
搭配附属插件即可实现
Bossshoppro地址:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-931518-1-1.html
限制次数附属:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-872439-1-1.html
